import requests
import datetime
import csv
import requests
import pandas as pd

getting_date = datetime.datetime.now().date() - datetime.timedelta(days=1)
current_date = getting_date.strftime("%d/%m/%Y")

# API endpoint
api_url = "https://v9.footfallcam.com/FootfallCam/exportData"

# Request parameters
params = {
     "infoJson": '{"cat":"1","id":["26509"],"data":[],"fromdate":"' + current_date + '","todate":"' + current_date + '","period":"0","dateformat":"dd/MM/yyyy","timeformat":"HH:mm:ss"}',
    #"infoJson": '{"cat":"1","id":["26509"],"data":[],"fromdate":"20/03/2023","todate":"20/06/2023","period":"0","dateformat":"dd/MM/yyyy","timeformat":"HH:mm:ss"}',
    "access_token": ""
}

# Make the API request
response = requests.get(api_url, params=params)

# Extract the "Data" part of the response
api_data = response.json()['Data']

# Convert API data to DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame(api_data)

# Save DataFrame to CSV file
df.to_csv('api_data.csv', index=False)

#print("API data saved as 'api_data.csv'")
